text: "I Care" is a 2012 song by Beyoncé. It was taken from her fourth studio album 4 (2011). It went to number 16 in Portugal and number 35 in South Korea. The song is an R&B; power ballad. It also has elements of soul and rock. == References == Category:2011 songs Category:2010s ballads Category:Beyoncé songs
title: I Care (Beyoncé song)
